an5.159:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
an5.159:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā udāyī mahatiyā gihiparisāya parivuto dhammaṃ desento nisinno hoti.
an5.159:1.4: Addasā kho āyasmā ānando āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ mahatiyā gihiparisāya parivutaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ nisinnaṃ.
an5.159:1.5: Disvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an5.159:1.6: “āyasmā, bhante, udāyī mahatiyā gihiparisāya parivuto dhammaṃ desetī”ti.
an5.159:2.1: “Na kho, ānanda, sukaraṃ paresaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ.
an5.159:2.2: Paresaṃ, ānanda, dhammaṃ desentena pañca dhamme ajjhattaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā paresaṃ dhammo desetabbo.
an5.159:2.6: ‘anuddayataṃ paṭicca kathaṃ kathessāmī’ti paresaṃ dhammo desetabbo;
an5.159:2.7: ‘na āmisantaro kathaṃ kathessāmī’ti paresaṃ dhammo desetabbo;
an5.159:2.8: ‘attānañca parañca anupahacca kathaṃ kathessāmī’ti paresaṃ dhammo desetabbo.
an5.159:2.9: Na kho, ānanda, sukaraṃ paresaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ.
an5.159:2.10: Paresaṃ, ānanda, dhammaṃ desentena ime pañca dhamme ajjhattaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā paresaṃ dhammo desetabbo”ti.
